CheckTitle: Checks if IAM users are members of at least one IAM group. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an IAM user is not a member of any group.
Description: Checks if IAM users are members of at least one IAM group. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an IAM user is not a member of any group.
Risk: IAM users without group memberships might indicate improper management of user permissions, potentially leading to overly permissive or restrictive access.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that IAM users are members of at least one IAM group
